entry.title: SOPA - Redaction & Censorship
entry.content:
Below is a censored version of my previous post on George Carlin. It has been censored, in protest of a bill that gives any corporation and the US government the power to censor the internet--a bill that could pass THIS WEEK. To see the uncensored text, and to stop internet censorship, visit: americancensorship.org.
